Aegea.description: Aegea is a blog engine created by Ilya Birman.

BUROGU.description: Burogu is a no-code platform that enables users to create and manage blogs.

Beehiiv.description: Beehiiv is a relatively young, hosted newsletter platform built for businesses and creators.

Blogger.description: Blogger is a blog-publishing service that allows multi-user blogs with time-stamped entries.

DropInBlog.description: DropInBlog is a remotely hosted, cloud based platform that is designed to embed a blog into your html site.

Haloscan.description: Haloscan is a tool that enables blogs to incorporate trackbacks and comments, allowing users to engage with blog content through discussions and feedback.

Hashnode.description: Hashnode is a free developer blogging platform that allows you to publish articles on your own domain and helps you stay connected with a global developer community.

Jugem.description: Jugem is a blogging software from Japan that allows users to create, manage, and publish online content.

LiveJournal.description: LiveJournal is a social networking service where users can keep a blog, journal or diary.

Medium.description: Medium is an online publishing platform.

Overblog.description: Overblog is a French blog platform that enables users to create and share content.

Postach.description: Postach is a blogging platform integrated with Evernote, allowing users to create and manage blog posts directly from their Evernote account.

Quickblog.description: Quickblog is a platform that aids bloggers and agencies in producing embedded, SEO-ready blog content seamlessly compatible with any existing website.

Substack.description: Substack is an American online platform that provides publishing, payment, analytics, and design infrastructure to support subscription newsletters.

Superblog.description: Superblog is a blogging platform that automatically manages SEO audits, page speed optimization, sudden traffic spikes, and reader experience.

Tumblr.description: Tumblr is a microblogging and social networking website. The service allows users to post multimedia and other content to a short-form blog.

TypePad.description: Typepad is a blog hosting service.

Typecho.description: Typecho is a PHP Blogging Platform.

Zinnia.description: Zimbra is a is a collaborative software suite that includes an email server and a web client.
